detail_desc: Satin sandals with covered heels and long straps that tie around the ankles. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7.5 cm. The polyester content of the sandals is partly recycled.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shorts in textured, double-weave organic cotton with narrow, covered elastication at the waist.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a zip fly and button, high paper bag waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, and diagonal side pockets. Loose fit with straight legs.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Soft, non-wired, push-up bra with decorative straps and moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, elasticated hem and no fasteners.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with a faux fur pompom on top, and a ribbed turn-up at the hem.

Push-up bra in mesh and jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable lace-trimmed shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with smocking at the top, narrow tie-top shoulder straps, a small frill trim at the top and a seam under the bust.

Trousers in soft cotton canvas with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and a pocket and loop on one leg. Gently tapered legs with knee patches.
Short-sleeved, fitted top in stretch, ribbed jersey.
Padded jacket with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front. Zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Zip-through hoodies in soft sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, kangaroo pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in a patterned weave with a detachable, lined hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lightly padded sleeves and covered elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Top in soft pile with an embroidered appliqué on the front, press-stud on one shoulder and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Push-up bras in soft jersey and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs.
Blouse in an airy plumeti cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a small frill trim around the neckline. Short sleeves with a small frill trim.
Trainers with a scalloped trim around the opening, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Twill insoles and rubber soles.
V-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with gathered seams and a zip at the hems.
Jacket with a soft pile lining, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets.

Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a flounce at the top. Cut-out section with ties at the back and a concealed zip in one side. Satin lining.
Oversized jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with a V-neck front and back, low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with closer-fitting cuffs, and slits in the sides.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist with an extended waistband and hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.

Short dress in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a frill-trimmed, rounded collar in a cotton weave and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a flared, tiered skirt.
Sandals in imitation suede and imitation leather. Adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck, short sleeves and buttons down the front. Tapered waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in a viscose crêpe blend with lace trims. Narrow shoulder straps, V-neck at the front and short slits in the sides.
Small bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable, detachable fabric shoulder strap with a text motif. Lined. Size 4.5x14x19 cm.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Pyjama bottoms in patterned sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and legs with decorative stitching and narrow hems.
Windbreaker in a nylon weave with a lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Blouse in sheer satin with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and low V-neck with decorative buttons at one side. Long sleeves with gathers and buttons at the cuffs.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Short, smocked, off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with short sleeves and overlocked edges.

Push-up body in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that meet at the back, decorative lace straps at the back and an opening with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
Straight-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings and a gilet. Bodysuit in cotton jersey with decorative picot trims, lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings in ribbed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and bow at the back. Gilet in soft pile with a concealed button at the neckline and cotton jersey lining.
Chino shorts in a slightly stretchy cotton weave with low ribbing at the waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft jersey. Top with a V-neck and wrapover front for easier nursing access, and seam under the bust. Bottoms with a wide waist panel that is elasticated at the top for best fit over the tummy, and elasticated hems.
Long, pleated skirt in an airy weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and a straight-cut hem.

Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets, fake back pockets with a flap, and legs that can be rolled up with a tab and press-stud.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft, ribbed jersey with long sleeves and gathered elastication in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey.
Metal and imitation pearl earrings in various designs. Diameter from 1 cm to 2 cm.

Long down jacket in nylon with a round neckline and detachable, padded hood. Two-way zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped inner pocket and a drawstring at the hem. Lined. Filling 80% down and 20% feathers.

Oversized shirt in sturdy, organic cotton denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down the sides and at the crotch.
Top in soft, block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a soft weave with elastication and a flounce at the top. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and short legs.
Chiffon dress with a wide neckline, small opening and button at the back of the neck, 3/4-length, flounced sleeves, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.

Biker jacket in soft imitation leather with a collar with press-studs, a diagonal zip at the front and a zip at the cuffs. Three smaller front pockets, two with a zip and one with a flap and press-stud, and tabs with press-studs at the hem. Lined.

Padded jacket in windproof and water-repellent functional fabric. Hood with an elasticated drawstring, a high collar and a zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a zipped inner pocket and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Partly lined.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with decorative, crossover straps at the front and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners. Seamless.
Blouse in a soft weave made from a cotton blend with a square neckline buttons down the front and short flutter sleeves.
Mesh bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Shirt in a cotton twill weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button at the waist, and skinny legs.
Top in woven fabric with a gently draped front and narrow shoulder straps. Lined.
Strapless maxi dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Integral top with elastication at the top.
Bras in cotton jersey with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Fine-knit jumper in premium cotton with a ribbed polo-neck collar and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Wide-fitting, calf-length dress in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Sleeveless top in a pleated weave with a gathered, smocked stand-up collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck.
Fancy dress masks in plastic foam with two elastic straps at the back.
Lace hipster briefs with a lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Corset in lace and mesh with an underwired bra that gives the bust a natural shape and provides light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Chelsea boots in imitation suede with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles in a contrasting colour with a low heel.
